pr_title: [resolves #3388] Provide docker image on openjdk15 to support arm64

timeline.message: [resolves #3388] Provide docker image on openjdk15 to support arm64

timeline.bodyText:
With Teku we need to build the docker images as the develop version rather than the project version (Besu does it differently because of some historical differences in CI setup and it just never changed back).

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              def dockerBuildVersion = rootProject.version
          
          
            
              def dockerBuildVersion = 'develop'
timeline.author: ajsutton

timeline.message: Build docker images as develop version.
